options.text: Currently use Asana for task management, despite lacking real-time collaboration.
options.why: Asana is popular but lacks seamless Slack integration for real-time updates.

options.text: Rely on Trello boards, which require manual updates and lack automation.
options.why: While visual, Trello lacks automation for campaign management.

options.text: Use Google Docs for collaborative briefs, but lacks real-time AI insights
options.why: Common and accessible but doesn't offer AI-driven automation
